title: Which Snapdragon chipsets are 5G capable? - Quora

response.answer_text: Qualcomm is the top best leading processor brand In the current smartphone industry, just at the beginning of this year, they introduce new latest 5G smartphone processors that are faster, smarter & tech-savvy. Snapdragon 865 5G, Snapdragon 765 5G & Snapdragon 765G 5G. Snapdragon 865 5G Introduction: In the current market, this is the most powerful processor of Qualcomm. This 5G technology enabled processor scales 5G leading 5th gen 7nm processor, AI to power next-generation Smart devices, This premium processor can enable a device, with breakthrough features - from Gigapixel speed photography to desktop-level gaming features. It can drive the device's experiences in a more intuitive, intelligent and responsive way than ever. It is equipped with amazing tech inside it to make itself. Qualcomm Spectra™ 480 ISP: For Stunning Photography it can capture high quality 64 MP Photos, capturing professional-quality photos and videos at the faster speed it is what requirement in today's gen smartphone devices. It process Capturing speed at 2 Gigapixels per second Which is really fast and amazing. This 480 ISP spectrum delivers new camera features which include Dolby Vision video capture, 8K video recording, capture 200-megapixel of photos, and simultaneously capture 4K HDR video and 64 MP photos. Qualcomm® Kryo™ 585 CPU: This new CPU provides 25% faster performance to power devices with extreme dynamic processing, intensive experiences with incredible efficiency and superior battery life throughout the day. comes with Quick Charge AI technology checks battery health and safety to help extend battery life cycles up to 200 days. This battery health checking and health meter are the best features in this processor.  This AI Engine packs 2x the performance of its predecessor, with the brand itself new Qualcomm® Hexagon™ Tensor Accelerator, it can pushes 15 trillion operations per second with maximum efficiency in a device. This brilliant machine fuels intuitive mobile experiences in photography, gaming and voice interactions such as real-time AI translation. Snapdragon X55 5G Modem-RF: This is the latest 5G most advanced chipset after the 4G system. The System achieves staggering multi-gigabit speeds of up to 7.5 Gbps and supports all key regions and frequency bands from 5G mmWave and sub-6, TDD and FDD, to SA and NSA modes. With support for Dynamic Spectrum Sharing (DSS) Snapdragon X55 helps rapidly expand the 5G global footprint which is said to be at a very advanced stage. Features:• Supports global roaming and global multi-SIM • Supports all key regions and frequency bands including mmWave, sub-6, TDD, FDD and Dynamic Spectrum Sharing (DSS)• Compatible with both standalone and non-standalone modes  • 5th generation Qualcomm AI Engine is 2x more powerful than its predecessor • 15 TOPS AI performance while using lower power • All-new Qualcomm® Hexagon™ Tensor Accelerator• New CV-ISP operates at 2 Gigapixels per second• No limit HD slow-motion video capture at 960 FPS• First Dolby Vision for video capture on mobile• Qualcomm® Adreno™ 650 GPU delivers up to 25% performance boost from its predecessor• A full suite of brand-new Snapdragon Elite Gaming features including Desktop Forward Rendering, Qualcomm® Game Color Plus v2.0, Qualcomm® Game Smoother• True 10-bit HDR gaming and first-ever updatable GPU drivers on mobile  • Kyro CPU provides 25% faster performance• New Qualcomm Sensing Hub• Low power AI voice assistant support with contextual awareness Supports voice, audio, and sensors • Hexagon Voice Assistant Accelerator for advanced voice use cases Qualcomm Aqstic™ Audio Technologies offer native DSD support, PCM up to 384 kHz/32-bit and customizable "Golden Ears" filter• Qualcomm® aptX™ Adaptive audio for robust, low-latency and high-quality wireless audio  Snapdragon 765 5G In this processor, the Qualcomm® Adreno™ 620 GPU provides 10% faster graphics rendering compared to the standard Snapdragon 765. This Processor provides some gaming modes that can be selected Snapdragon Elite Gaming features fuel smooth interactions, near-instant response, incredible audio, and cinema-quality graphics. This much at a with boost up battery mode is there which saves battery and provide enough power for other performing task. The Snapdragon X52 5G Modem-RF System and 5th gen Qualcomm AI Engine work in tandem to power blazing performance and uninterrupted gameplay. Plus, 5G connectivity gives gamers superior access to multi-player gaming from the cloud. It is equipped with Qualcomm® aptX™ audio which provides a growing sound from the speaker at high clarity & dynamic base with fully immersive, 3D surround-sound audio that synchronizes with all gaming action on-screen. • Support for mmWave, sub-6, TDD, FDD and Dynamic Spectrum Sharing for truly global coverage • Qualcomm® 5G PowerSave provides major power efficiency improvements for big battery benefits • Qualcomm® FastConnect™ 6200 subsystem maximizes connectivity with Wi-Fi 6 features• Up to 5.5 TOPS AI performance• The all-new Qualcomm® Hexagon™ Tensor Accelerator is 2x faster than the previous generation • Adreno 620 offers 10% faster graphics rendering compared to standard Snapdragon 765• Select Snapdragon Elite Gaming features including:  • Qualcomm® Game Jank Reducer v2.0 • Qualcomm® Game Fast Loader • Qualcomm® Game Network Latency Manager • Supports Dolby Vision video playback • AI and CV-ISP create a camera that is smarter, quicker and delivers 4x power savings when compared with a standard ISP• CV-ISP supports real-time object classification, segmentation, and replacement•  aptX Adaptive keeps audio in sync with media • aptX voice audio for super wideband calls• aptX Adaptive Audio for robust, low-latency, high-quality wireless audio  • Hexagon Voice Assistant Accelerator for advanced voice use cases• Always-on echo cancellation and noise suppression • Qualcomm Aqstic™ audio codec (Up to WCD938x) and speaker amplifier (up to WSA8815)• Customizable "Golden Ears" filter • Quick Charge AI Technology is designed to extend battery life cycles up to 200 days Snapdragon 765G 5G It has the same feature as 765 5G but some feature might be different Conclusion: The smartphone processors are like a brain part of a smartphone and if upgrades with time to time then it will eventually help in making this world into a digital era. So keep your smartphone up to date from time to time. Source: Wireless Technology & Innovation | Mobile Technology | Qualcomm

Let me help with that. Here’s the list of Snapdragon chipsets that (currently) support 5G : 800 Series Snapdragon : Snapdragon 855 (had to be coupled with X50 5G Modem)Snapdragon 855+ (same as 855 as well)Snapdragon 865 (had to be coupled with X55 5G Modem)Snapdragon 8cx (for laptops)700 Series Snapdragon : Snapdragon 765 (built-in with X52 Modem instead had to be coupled like their 800 Series)Snapdragon 765G (same as 765 as well)That’s all the list when this was being written. Qualcomm also said their 600 Series will support 5G connectivity at foreseeable future, albeit we have to wait about that.
